1.1.1.en:
Added support for text messages in voice channels
Added support for custom slash commands
Added Blockly support with special custom blocks
Send error replies on slash commands as ephemeral
Added config option to send all slash command replies as ephemeral
Register get/set commands only if states are configured for this
Choices for commands are now handled as autocomplete which allows more choices, is more dynamic and shows the choices only to authorized users
Added command options to `raw.interactionJson` json content
Fixed command name checks
Fixed some crashes / stuck conditions when network is not available
Fixed several small bugs
